system.name: Laser Pistol
system.description:
Stunner (TL10): Firing a precise electromagnetic pulse, this non-lethal weapon disrupts the target's neural processes, leading to stun and potentially unconsciousness.

Stun: These weapons are designed to deal non-lethal damage and will incapacitate a living target instead of killing it. Damage is only deducted from END, considering any armor. If the targetâ€™s END is reduced to 0, the target is incapacitated and unable to perform any actions for a number of rounds by which the damage exceeded his END. Damage received from Stun weapons is completely healed after one hour of rest.

Zero-G: does not suffer a penalty for firing a weapon in zero-g conditions. Lasers automatically have the Zero-G aspect.
